anger-shell.name: anger-shell
anger-shell.flavor_text: When an attack causes its HP to drop to half or less, the Pokémon gets angry. This lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

armor-tail.name: armor-tail
armor-tail.flavor_text: The mysterious tail covering the Pokémon's head makes opponents unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.

beads-of-ruin.name: beads-of-ruin
beads-of-ruin.flavor_text: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous beads lowers the Sp. Def stats of all Pokémon except itself.

commander.name: commander
commander.flavor_text: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field. The Pokémon then issues commands from there.

costar.name: costar
costar.flavor_text: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it copies an ally's stat changes.

cud-chew.name: cud-chew
cud-chew.flavor_text: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.

earth-eater.name: earth-eater
earth-eater.flavor_text: If hit by a Ground-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

electromorphosis.name: electromorphosis
electromorphosis.flavor_text: The Pokémon becomes charged when it takes damage, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.

good-as-gold.name: good-as-gold
good-as-gold.flavor_text: A body of pure, solid gold gives the Pokémon full immunity to other Pokémon's status moves.

guard-dog.name: guard-dog
guard-dog.flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon´s Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.

lingering-aroma.name: lingering-aroma
lingering-aroma.flavor_text: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker's Ability to Lingering Aroma.

mycelium-might.name: mycelium-might
mycelium-might.flavor_text: The Pokémon will always act more slowly when using status moves, but these moves will be unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

opportunist.name: opportunist
opportunist.flavor_text: If an opponent's stat is boosted, the Pokémon seizes the opportunity to boost the same stat for itself.

orichalcum-pulse.name: orichalcum-pulse
orichalcum-pulse.flavor_text: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle. The ancient pulse thrumming through the Pokémon also boosts its Attack stat in harsh sunlight.

protosynthesis.name: protosynthesis
protosynthesis.flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat in harsh sunlight or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.

purifying-salt.name: purifying-salt
purifying-salt.flavor_text: The Pokémon's pure salt protects it from status conditions and halves the damage taken from Ghost-type moves.

quark-drive.name: quark-drive
quark-drive.flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat on Electric Terrain or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.

seed-sower.name: seed-sower
seed-sower.flavor_text: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

supreme-overlord.name: supreme-overlord
supreme-overlord.flavor_text: When the Pokémon enters a battle, its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are slightly boosted for each of the allies in its party that have already been defeated.

sword-of-ruin.name: sword-of-ruin
sword-of-ruin.flavor_text: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous sword lowers the Defense stats of all Pokémon except itself.

tablets-of-ruin.name: tablets-of-ruin
tablets-of-ruin.flavor_text: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous wooden tablets lowers the Attack stats of all Pokémon except itself.

thermal-exchange.name: thermal-exchange
thermal-exchange.flavor_text: Boosts the Attack stat when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire-type move. The Pokémon also cannot be status-burned.

toxic-debris.name: toxic-debris
toxic-debris.flavor_text: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.

vessel-of-ruin.name: vessel-of-ruin
vessel-of-ruin.flavor_text: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous vessel lowers the Sp. Atk stats of all Pokémon except itself.

well-baked-body.name: well-baked-body
well-baked-body.flavor_text: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Fire-type moves. Instead, its Defense stat is sharply boosted.

wind-power.name: wind-power
wind-power.flavor_text: The Pokémon becomes charged when it is hit by a wind move, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.

wind-rider.name: wind-rider
wind-rider.flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat if Tailwind takes effect or if the Pokémon is hit by a wind move. The Pokémon also takes no damage from wind moves.

zero-to-hero.name: zero-to-hero
zero-to-hero.flavor_text: The Pokémon transforms into its Hero Form when it switches out.

liquid-voice.name: liquid-voice
liquid-voice.flavor_text: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.

mega-launcher.name: mega-launcher
mega-launcher.flavor_text: Powers up aura and pulse moves.

tough-claws.name: tough-claws
tough-claws.flavor_text: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

motor-drive.name: motor-drive
motor-drive.flavor_text: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.

no-guard.name: no-guard
no-guard.flavor_text: Ensures the Pokémon and its foe´s attacks land.

effect_entries.effect: Wegen eines Glitches haben Attacken die von dieser Fähigkeit beeinflusst sind eine (100 - Genauigkeit)% Chance durch den detect oder protect zu treffen.
Due to a glitch, moves affected by this ability have a (100 - accuracy)% chance to hit through detect or protect.

normalize.name: normalize
normalize.flavor_text: All the Pokémon´s moves become the Normal type.

poison-touch.name: poison-touch
poison-touch.flavor_text: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

prankster.name: prankster
prankster.flavor_text: Gives priority to a status move.

effect_entries.effect: Hat außerhalb vom Kampf keinen Effekt.
Has no overworld effect.
Betrifft keine Attacken von Teammitgliedern die alle anderen Pokémon als Ziel haben. Diese Fähigkeit wird im Kampf nicht angekündigt.
Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon.  This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.

propeller-tail.name: propeller-tail
propeller-tail.flavor_text: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon´s Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

punk-rock.name: punk-rock
punk-rock.flavor_text: Boosts the power of sound-based moves. The Pokémon also takes half the damage from these kinds of moves.

overgrow.name: overgrow
overgrow.flavor_text: Ups GRASS moves in a pinch.

blaze.name: blaze
blaze.flavor_text: Ups FIRE moves in a pinch.

torrent.name: torrent
torrent.flavor_text: Ups WATER moves in a pinch.

solar-power.name: solar-power
solar-power.flavor_text: Boosts Sp. Atk, but lowers HP in sunshine.

effect_entries.effect: Die Chance, dass der Effekt eintritt, beträgt 30%.
Chance of taking effect is 30%.
Die Chance, dass der Effekt eintritt, beträgt 33%.
Chance of taking effect is 33%.
Hat außerhalb vom Kampf keinen Effekt.
Has no overworld effect.

swarm.name: swarm
swarm.flavor_text: Ups BUG moves in a pinch.

effect_entries.effect: Hat außerhalb vom Kampf keinen Effekt.
Has no overworld effect.
Erhöht die Anzahl an Rufen die man außerhalb vom Kampf hört, wenn irgendein Pokémon im Team diese Fähigkeit hat.
Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.

sniper.name: sniper
sniper.flavor_text: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

adaptability.name: adaptability
adaptability.flavor_text: Powers up moves of the same type.

aftermath.name: aftermath
aftermath.flavor_text: Damages the foe landing the finishing hit.

analytic.name: analytic
analytic.flavor_text: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

anger-point.name: anger-point
anger-point.flavor_text: Raises Attack upon taking a critical hit.

effect_entries.effect: Hat außerhalb vom Kampf keinen Effekt.
Has no overworld effect.

aroma-veil.name: aroma-veil
aroma-veil.flavor_text: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

aura-break.name: aura-break
aura-break.flavor_text: The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed.

ball-fetch.name: ball-fetch
ball-fetch.flavor_text: If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the Poké Ball from the first failed throw of the battle.

battery.name: battery
battery.flavor_text: Powers up ally Pokémon´s special moves.

beast-boost.name: beast-boost
beast-boost.flavor_text: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.

berserk.name: berserk
berserk.flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon´s Sp. Atk stat when it takes a  hit that causes its HP to become half or less.

big-pecks.name: big-pecks
big-pecks.flavor_text: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

bulletproof.name: bulletproof
bulletproof.flavor_text: Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.

cheek-pouch.name: cheek-pouch
cheek-pouch.flavor_text: Restores HP as well when the Pokémon eats a Berry.

chilling-neigh.name: chilling-neigh
chilling-neigh.flavor_text: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat.

effect_entries.effect: Löst bei Attacken die mehrmals Treffen bei jedem Treffer aus.
Triggers on every hit of multiple-hit moves.

comatose.name: comatose
comatose.flavor_text: It´s always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.

competitive.name: competitive
competitive.flavor_text: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat when a stat is lowered.

contrary.name: contrary
contrary.flavor_text: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

corrosion.name: corrosion
corrosion.flavor_text: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it´s a Steel or Poison type.

cotton-down.name: cotton-down
cotton-down.flavor_text: When the Pokémon is hit by an attack, it scatters cotton fluff around and lowers the Speed stat of all Pokémon except itself.

cursed-body.name: cursed-body
cursed-body.flavor_text: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect: Hat außerhalb vom Kampf keinen Effekt.
Has no overworld effect.

dancer.name: dancer
dancer.flavor_text: When another Pokémon uses a dance move, it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.

dark-aura.name: dark-aura
dark-aura.flavor_text: Powers up each Pokémon´s Dark-type moves.

dauntless-shield.name: dauntless-shield
dauntless-shield.flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon´s Defense stat when the Pokémon enters a battle.

dazzling.name: dazzling
dazzling.flavor_text: Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.

defeatist.name: defeatist
defeatist.flavor_text: Lowers stats when HP becomes half or less.

defiant.name: defiant
defiant.flavor_text: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.

disguise.name: disguise
disguise.flavor_text: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack.

download.name: download
download.flavor_text: Adjusts power according to the foe´s ability.

dry-skin.name: dry-skin
dry-skin.flavor_text: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

electric-surge.name: electric-surge
electric-surge.flavor_text: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

emergency-exit.name: emergency-exit
emergency-exit.flavor_text: The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

fairy-aura.name: fairy-aura
fairy-aura.flavor_text: Powers up each Pokémon´s Fairy-type moves.

effect_entries.effect: Hat außerhalb vom Kampf keinen Effekt.
Has no overworld effect.

flare-boost.name: flare-boost
flare-boost.flavor_text: Powers up special attacks when burned.

flash-fire.name: flash-fire
flash-fire.flavor_text: Powers up if hit by fire.

effect_entries.effect: will o wisp triggert die Fähigkeit nicht bei Pokémon die immun gegen burn sind.
will o wisp does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to burns.

flower-gift.name: flower-gift
flower-gift.flavor_text: Powers up party Pokémon when it is sunny.

flower-veil.name: flower-veil
flower-veil.flavor_text: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokémon´s stats.

fluffy.name: fluffy
fluffy.flavor_text: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.

forewarn.name: forewarn
forewarn.flavor_text: Determines what moves the foe has.

frisk.name: frisk
frisk.flavor_text: The Pokémon can check the foe´s held item.

full-metal-body.name: full-metal-body
full-metal-body.flavor_text: Prevents other Pokémon´s moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon´s stats.

harvest.name: harvest
harvest.flavor_text: May create another Berry after one is used.

gluttony.name: gluttony
gluttony.flavor_text: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

gooey.name: gooey
gooey.flavor_text: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker´s Speed stat.

grass-pelt.name: grass-pelt
grass-pelt.flavor_text: Boosts the Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.

grassy-surge.name: grassy-surge
grassy-surge.flavor_text: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

grim-neigh.name: grim-neigh
grim-neigh.flavor_text: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.

gulp-missile.name: gulp-missile
gulp-missile.flavor_text: When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will come back with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey to attack.

effect_entries.effect: Hat keinen Effekt während das Pokémon schläft.
Does not take effect during sleep.

healer.name: healer
healer.flavor_text: May heal an ally´s status conditions.

heatproof.name: heatproof
heatproof.flavor_text: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

honey-gather.name: honey-gather
honey-gather.flavor_text: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.

hunger-switch.name: hunger-switch
hunger-switch.flavor_text: The Pokémon changes its form, alternating between its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of each turn.

effect_entries.effect: Hat außerhalb vom Kampf keinen Effekt.
Has no overworld effect.

hydration.name: hydration
hydration.flavor_text: Heals status problems if it is raining.

effect_entries.effect: Hat außerhalb vom Kampf keinen Effekt.
Has no overworld effect.
Verdoppelt den Radius in dem cut Gras entfernt, wenn irgendein Pokémon im Team diese Fähigkeit hat.
Doubles cut's grass-cutting radius on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.

ice-body.name: ice-body
ice-body.flavor_text: The Pokémon regains HP in a hailstorm.

ice-scales.name: ice-scales
ice-scales.flavor_text: The Pokémon is protected by ice scales, which halve the damage taken from special moves.

illusion.name: illusion
illusion.flavor_text: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in back.

imposter.name: imposter
imposter.flavor_text: It transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.

infiltrator.name: infiltrator
infiltrator.flavor_text: Passes through the foe´s barrier and strikes.

innards-out.name: innards-out
innards-out.flavor_text: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.

ice-face.name: ice-face
ice-face.flavor_text: The Pokémon´s ice head can take a physical attack as a substitute, but the attack also changes the Pokémon´s appearance. The ice will be restored when it hails.

effect_entries.effect: Hat außerhalb vom Kampf keinen Effekt.
Has no overworld effect.
Hat keinen Effekt, wenn die Fähigkeit nach Kampfbeginn erlangt wurde.
Does not take effect if acquired after entering battle.

intrepid-sword.name: intrepid-sword
intrepid-sword.flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon´s Attack stat when the Pokémon enters a battle.

zen-mode.name: zen-mode
zen-mode.flavor_text: Changes the Pokémon´s shape when HP is halved.

wonder-skin.name: wonder-skin
wonder-skin.flavor_text: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.

wimp-out.name: wimp-out
wimp-out.flavor_text: The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

effect_entries.effect: Hat außerhalb vom Kampf keinen Effekt.
Has no overworld effect.

weak-armor.name: weak-armor
weak-armor.flavor_text: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

water-compaction.name: water-compaction
water-compaction.flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon´s Defense stat sharply when hit by a Water-type move.

water-bubble.name: water-bubble
water-bubble.flavor_text: Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the Pokémon and prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

wandering-spirit.name: wandering-spirit
wandering-spirit.flavor_text: The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.

effect_entries.effect: electric-Attacken die keinen Schaden anrichten, wie thunder wave, werden nicht absorbiert.
Does not absorb non-damaging electric moves, i.e. thunder wave.

victory-star.name: victory-star
victory-star.flavor_text: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.

unseen-fist.name: unseen-fist
unseen-fist.flavor_text: If the Pokémon uses moves that make direct contact, it can attack the target even if the target protects itself.

unnerve.name: unnerve
unnerve.flavor_text: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

unburden.name: unburden
unburden.flavor_text: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

unaware.name: unaware
unaware.flavor_text: Ignores any change in ability by the foe.

turboblaze.name: turboblaze
turboblaze.flavor_text: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

triage.name: triage
triage.flavor_text: Gives priority to a healing move.

effect_entries.effect: Kann flower gift und wonder guard kopieren.
Can copy flower gift and wonder guard.
Kann forecast und trace kopieren.
Can copy forecast and trace.

toxic-boost.name: toxic-boost
toxic-boost.flavor_text: Powers up physical attacks when poisoned.

teravolt.name: teravolt
teravolt.flavor_text: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

telepathy.name: telepathy
telepathy.flavor_text: Anticipates an ally´s attack and dodges it.

technician.name: technician
technician.flavor_text: Powers up the Pokémon´s weaker moves.

effect_entries.effect: struggle wird nicht beeinflusst. helping hand und defense curl werden nicht beachtet.
struggle is unaffected.  helping hand and defense curl are not taken into account.

tangled-feet.name: tangled-feet
tangled-feet.flavor_text: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

effect_entries.effect: Hat außerhalb vom Kampf keinen Effekt.
Has no overworld effect.
Kann das Wesen von Pokémon mit denen in der Spielwelt interagiert wird nicht verändern.
Cannot influence the natures of Pokémon encountered by interacting with them on the overworld.
Gibt schwere poison als normale poison zurück.
Passes back bad poison as regular poison.

symbiosis.name: symbiosis
symbiosis.flavor_text: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.

sweet-veil.name: sweet-veil
sweet-veil.flavor_text: Prevents itself and ally Pokémon from falling asleep.

super-luck.name: super-luck
super-luck.flavor_text: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

effect_entries.effect: Verhindert keine regulären K.O. bei vollen hp.
Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.

strong-jaw.name: strong-jaw
strong-jaw.flavor_text: The Pokémon´s strong jaw gives it tremendous biting power.

storm-drain.name: storm-drain
storm-drain.flavor_text: The Pokémon draws in all Water-type moves.

effect_entries.effect: Leitet water-Attacken um ohne den special attack Bonus zu gewähren. Leitet hidden power nicht um.
Redirects water moves without negating them or granting any Special Attack boost.  Does not redirect hidden power.
Hat außerhalb vom Kampf keinen Effekt.
Has no overworld effect.
Hat im Kampf keinen Effekt.
Has no effect in battle.

steely-spirit.name: steely-spirit
steely-spirit.flavor_text: Powers up ally Pokémon´s Steel-type moves.

steam-engine.name: steam-engine
steam-engine.flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon´s Speed stat drastically if hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.

steadfast.name: steadfast
steadfast.flavor_text: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

effect_entries.effect: Hat außerhalb vom Kampf keinen Effekt.
Has no overworld effect.

stance-change.name: stance-change
stance-change.flavor_text: The Pokémon changes form depending on how it battles.

stamina.name: stamina
stamina.flavor_text: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.

stalwart.name: stalwart
stalwart.flavor_text: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon´s Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

stall.name: stall
stall.flavor_text: The Pokémon moves after even slower foes.

stakeout.name: stakeout
stakeout.flavor_text: Doubles the damage dealt to the target´s replacement if the target switches out.

effect_entries.effect: Hindert heal bell daran, das Pokémon zu heilen, auch außerhalb vom Kampf.
Prevents heal bell from curing the Pokémon, whether or not it is in battle.

soul-heart.name: soul-heart
soul-heart.flavor_text: Boosts its Sp. Atk stat every time a Pokémon faints.

snow-warning.name: snow-warning
snow-warning.flavor_text: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.

slush-rush.name: slush-rush
slush-rush.flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon´s Speed stat in a hailstorm.

skill-link.name: skill-link
skill-link.flavor_text: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

effect_entries.effect: triple kick wird nicht beeinflusst.
triple kick is unaffected.

simple.name: simple
simple.flavor_text: The Pokémon is prone to wild stat changes.

shields-down.name: shields-down
shields-down.flavor_text: When its HP becomes half or less, the Pokémon´s shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.

sheer-force.name: sheer-force
sheer-force.flavor_text: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

effect_entries.effect: Betrifft andere Pokémon mit dieser Fähigkeit.
Affects other Pokémon with this ability.

screen-cleaner.name: screen-cleaner
screen-cleaner.flavor_text: When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for both opposing and ally Pokémon.

scrappy.name: scrappy
scrappy.flavor_text: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type foes.

schooling.name: schooling
schooling.flavor_text: When it has a lot of HP, the Pokémon forms a powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP is low.

sap-sipper.name: sap-sipper
sap-sipper.flavor_text: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

sand-spit.name: sand-spit
sand-spit.flavor_text: The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it´s hit by an attack.

sand-rush.name: sand-rush
sand-rush.flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon´s Speed in a sandstorm.

sand-force.name: sand-force
sand-force.flavor_text: Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.

effect_entries.effect: Verursacht nur 1/16 der maximalen hp des Angreifers Schaden.
Inflicts only 1/16 of the attacker's maximum HP in damage.

rock-head.name: rock-head
rock-head.flavor_text: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

rks-system.name: rks-system
rks-system.flavor_text: Changes the Pokémon´s type to match the memory disc it holds.

rivalry.name: rivalry
rivalry.flavor_text: Raises Attack if the foe is of the same gender.

ripen.name: ripen
ripen.flavor_text: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.

regenerator.name: regenerator
regenerator.flavor_text: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

reckless.name: reckless
reckless.flavor_text: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

receiver.name: receiver
receiver.flavor_text: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

rattled.name: rattled
rattled.flavor_text: Some move types scare it and boost its Speed.

quick-feet.name: quick-feet
quick-feet.flavor_text: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.

queenly-majesty.name: queenly-majesty
queenly-majesty.flavor_text: Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.

psychic-surge.name: psychic-surge
psychic-surge.flavor_text: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

protean.name: protean
protean.flavor_text: Changes the Pokémon´s type to the type of the move it´s using.

prism-armor.name: prism-armor
prism-armor.flavor_text: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

power-spot.name: power-spot
power-spot.flavor_text: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.

poison-heal.name: poison-heal
poison-heal.flavor_text: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.

effect_entries.effect: poison schadet dem Pokémon außerhalb vom Kampf.
Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.
Funktioniert nur wenn es mit minus kombiniert wird.
Powers up only when paired with minus.
Hat im Kampf keinen Effekt.
Has no effect in battle.

pickpocket.name: pickpocket
pickpocket.flavor_text: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

perish-body.name: perish-body
perish-body.flavor_text: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.

overcoat.name: overcoat
overcoat.flavor_text: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.

neutralizing-gas.name: neutralizing-gas
neutralizing-gas.flavor_text: If the Pokémon with Neutralizing Gas is in the battle, the effects of all Pokémon´s Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.

mummy.name: mummy
mummy.flavor_text: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this Ability.

multitype.name: multitype
multitype.flavor_text: Changes type to match the held Plate.

multiscale.name: multiscale
multiscale.flavor_text: Reduces damage when HP is full.

moxie.name: moxie
moxie.flavor_text: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

moody.name: moody
moody.flavor_text: Raises one stat and lowers another.

mold-breaker.name: mold-breaker
mold-breaker.flavor_text: Moves can be used regardless of abilities.

misty-surge.name: misty-surge
misty-surge.flavor_text: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

mirror-armor.name: mirror-armor
mirror-armor.flavor_text: Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.

effect_entries.effect: Funktioniert nur wenn es mit plus kombiniert wird.
Powers up only when paired with plus.

merciless.name: merciless
merciless.flavor_text: The Pokémon´s attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

effect_entries.effect: Hat außerhalb vom Kampf keinen Effekt.
Has no overworld effect.
Hat außerhalb vom Kampf keinen Effekt.
Has no overworld effect.

magician.name: magician
magician.flavor_text: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

magic-guard.name: magic-guard
magic-guard.flavor_text: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

effect_entries.effect: paralysis hindert das Pokémon nicht daran sich zu bewegen, aber der speed Malus bleibt. poison schadet dem Pokémon außerhalb vom Kampf.
Paralysis cannot prevent the Pokémon from moving, though the Speed cut is unaffected.  Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.

long-reach.name: long-reach
long-reach.flavor_text: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

effect_entries.effect: Hat außerhalb vom Kampf keinen Effekt.
Has no overworld effect.
Betrifft keine electric-Attacken die keinen Schaden anrichten, wie thunder wave. Erhöht die Anzahl an Trainer-Anrufen wenn irgendein Pokémon im Team diese Fähigkeit hat.
Does not affect non-damaging electric moves, i.e. thunder wave.  Increases the frequency of Match Call calls on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
Leitet electric-Attacken um, ohne ihre Effekte zu deaktivieren oder einen special attack Bonus zu gewähren. Leitet hidden power nicht um.
Redirects electric moves without negating them or granting any Special Attack boost.  Does not redirect hidden power.

leaf-guard.name: leaf-guard
leaf-guard.flavor_text: Prevents status problems in sunny weather.

effect_entries.effect: rest funktioniert normal bei starkem Sonnenlicht.
rest works as usual during strong sunlight.

klutz.name: klutz
klutz.flavor_text: The Pokémon can´t use any held items.

effect_entries.effect: fling kann normal benutzt werden.
fling can be used as usual.

justified.name: justified
justified.flavor_text: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.

iron-fist.name: iron-fist
iron-fist.flavor_text: Boosts the power of punching moves.

iron-barbs.name: iron-barbs
iron-barbs.flavor_text: Inflicts damage to the Pokémon on contact.

effect_entries.effect: Hat außerhalb vom Kampf keinen Effekt.
Has no overworld effect.
Hat außerhalb vom Kampf keinen Effekt.
Has no overworld effect.
Hat außerhalb vom Kampf keinen Effekt.
Has no overworld effect.
fire fang und Attacken die typenlosen Schaden verursachen, ignorieren diese Fähigkeit unabhängig von ihrem Typ.
fire fang and moves that inflict typeless damage ignore this ability regardless of type.

libero.name: libero
libero.flavor_text: Changes the Pokémon´s type to the type of the move it´s about to use.

shadow-shield.name: shadow-shield
shadow-shield.flavor_text: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.

hadron-engine.name: hadron-engine
hadron-engine.flavor_text: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle. The futuristic engine within the Pokémon also boosts its Sp. Atk stat on Electric Terrain.

pastel-veil.name: pastel-veil
pastel-veil.flavor_text: Protects the Pokémon and its ally Pokémon from being poisoned.

neuroforce.name: neuroforce
neuroforce.flavor_text: Powers up moves that are super effective.

tangling-hair.name: tangling-hair
tangling-hair.flavor_text: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker´s Speed stat.

power-construct.name: power-construct
power-construct.flavor_text: Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes half or less. Then the Pokémon changes its form to Complete Forme.

battle-bond.name: battle-bond
battle-bond.flavor_text: Defeating an opposing Pokémon strengthens the Pokémon´s bond with its Trainer, and it becomes Ash-Greninja. Water Shuriken gets more powerful.

galvanize.name: galvanize
galvanize.flavor_text: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

power-of-alchemy.name: power-of-alchemy
power-of-alchemy.flavor_text: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

mimicry.name: mimicry
mimicry.flavor_text: Changes the Pokémon´s type depending on the terrain.

gorilla-tactics.name: gorilla-tactics
gorilla-tactics.flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon´s Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.

desolate-land.name: desolate-land
desolate-land.flavor_text: Affects weather and nullifies any Water-type attacks.

curious-medicine.name: curious-medicine
curious-medicine.flavor_text: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it scatters medicine from its shell, which removes all stat changes from allies.

primordial-sea.name: primordial-sea
primordial-sea.flavor_text: Affects weather and nullifies any Fire-type attacks.

delta-stream.name: delta-stream
delta-stream.flavor_text: Affects weather and eliminates all of the Flying type´s weaknesses.

surge-surfer.name: surge-surfer
surge-surfer.flavor_text: Doubles the Pokémon´s Speed stat on Electric Terrain.

quick-draw.name: quick-draw
quick-draw.flavor_text: Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.

toxic-chain.name: toxic-chain
toxic-chain.flavor_text: The power of the Pokmon's toxic chain may badly poison any target the Pokmon hits with a move

tera-shell.name: tera-shell
tera-shell.flavor_text: The Pokmon's shell contains the powers of each type.All damage-dealing moves that hit the Pokmon when its HP is full will not be very effective.

supersweet-syrup.name: supersweet-syrup
supersweet-syrup.flavor_text: Lowers the evasion of opposing Pokmon by 1 stage when first sent into battle

hospitality.name: hospitality
hospitality.flavor_text: When the Pokmon enters a battle, it showers its ally with hospitality, restoring a small amount of the ally's HP

minds-eye.name: minds-eye
minds-eye.flavor_text: The Pokmon ignores changes to opponents' evasiveness, its accuracy can't be lowered, and it can hit Ghost types with Normal-type and Fighting-type moves

teraform-zero.name: teraform-zero
teraform-zero.flavor_text: When Terapagos changes into its Stellar Form,  it uses its hidden powers to eliminate all effects of weather and terrain, reducing them to zero
